sourcesContent:
/** @format */ import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { passwordreset } from '../actions/userActions'; import MessageBox from '../components/MessageBox'; import LoadingBox from '../components/LoadingBox'; function PasswordCodeVerify(props) { const [code, setCode] = useState(''); const userPasswordReset = useSelector((state) => state.userPasswordReset); const { loading, error, passwordReset } = userPasswordReset; const dispatch = useDispatch(); const submitHandler = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); dispatch(passwordreset(code)); }; useEffect(() => { if (passwordReset) { props.history.push('/resetcodeverify'); } return () => { // }; }, [passwordReset, props.history]); return ( <> {loading ? ( ) : (

Verify Password Reset Code

A reset code has been sent to your registered phone number

{error && {error}}

Please enter the 4-digit verification code we sent via SMS:

(we want to make sure it's you before we contact our movers)
Didn't receive the code?
Send code again
Change phone number
######
setCode(e.target.value)} placeholder="Enter code to verify" required />

Have an account? Log in

)} ); } export default PasswordCodeVerify;
